author: Taylor Green
comment: Had 5 stars and changed to 4 because there one thing that could help a lot... Saved presets of different interval timings to select from the watch would be great. I want to use this for multiple workouts, studying and more!.. Just need to be able to save different presets
title: Just one thing..

author: sumitraj Patil
comment: I have been using this app from past one year in my moto360 sport watch and it was fulfilling my workout purpose, but now it's not syncing to my watch. What's the problem?

author: Gary Peck
comment: Even though I've configured my preferred intervals on the phone, every time I run the app on my watch it offers the default intervals. I need to open the phone and get the app to sync with my watch to see my customized times.
title: Very convenient but has to be reset each time

author: jeremy blake
comment: Everything is fine except after 1 interval of work then rest , it defaults to something called ready, for a short time then back to work... What is up with that?
title: What is "ready"?

author: Paulo Gatchalian
comment: so the watch has to be on the whole time for the clock to keep ticking...like...why?
title: does not tick in ambient mode

author: Scott Lundegren
comment: I'm sorry, but this is completely useless. First off, the devs don't understand intervals. The flow of the app is completely screwed up. It should be a warm up period....then workout...then rest. The workout/rest periods repeat for a variable number of times...then there is a cool down period.  It has great potential but it needs work. However, seeing that it hasn't been updated since September 2014 I think its safe to say this app is out of business.

author: Yoav Slama
comment: If you`ll allow us to create custom intervals it would be perfect, because now it`s useless for me cause in my workout i have different rest and ready times (depends on the exercise i`ve just  finished).
title: Nice app but..
